\subsection*{Additional Inherited Members}


\subsection{Detailed Description}
Object used to write to new or existing files on the file system. 

T\+O\+D\+O\+: D\+O\+C, example use etc

T\+O\+D\+O\+: only supports U\+T\+F-\/8 and binary

Flags that can be used to describe how the file handle should be opened. 

These flags can be combined together using the logical or operator. \begin{Desc}

\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_aafcaef6dd3171373d8dfadadcc3c1b0baf46420535aaf1e5a6cf757485acaa2bc}{}F\+L\+A\+G\+\_\+\+B\+I\+N\+A\+R\+Y\label{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_aafcaef6dd3171373d8dfadadcc3c1b0baf46420535aaf1e5a6cf757485acaa2bc}

}]If the file already exists new data will be written to the end of of the file. If this flag is not specified writing to existing file will cause the original contents to be discarded. \end{description}
\end{Desc}

\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_ad5b7240d9d4856d6e2b8ddf99a11bced}{}\index{chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer@{chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer}!close@{close}}
\index{close@{close}!chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer@{chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer}}
\subsubsection[{close()}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer\+::close (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
{}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)\hspace{0.3cm}{\ttfamily [virtual]}}\label{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_ad5b7240d9d4856d6e2b8ddf99a11bced}


Closes this file writer and writes data to the file system. 

Once the file is closed write operations cannot be performed until the file writer is reopened.

This function does not need to be explicitly closed. When this object is destroyed it will be ensured that data is written and the handle is closed.


\begin{DoxyExceptions}{Exceptions}
{\em \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1ex_1_1_state_error}{chaos\+::ex\+::\+State\+Error}} & If this file handle is not open. \\
\hline
\end{DoxyExceptions}

\hypertarget{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_adb940c8094f94604f78879b3901584d4}{}\index{chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer@{chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer}!write@{write}}

\subsubsection[{write(const chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+T\+F8\+String \&text)}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}void chaos\+::io\+::sys\+::\+File\+Writer\+::write (
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}

\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)}\label{classchaos_1_1io_1_1sys_1_1_file_writer_adb940c8094f94604f78879b3901584d4}


Writes an \hyperlink{classchaos_1_1uni_1_1_u_t_f8_string}{chaos\+::uni\+::\+U\+T\+F8\+String} to the internal buffer of this file writer. 

The internal buffer is only written to the file system when this file writer is closed.
